title: Controller

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - At night, choose a player to Disrupt. If they visit a target tonight, they will instead be silently redirected to a random neighbor of the target.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You have 1 use of Disrupt.
- If you attempt to Disrupt a Killing role, they will ignore you. Both you and them are informed of this.
- You know who you redirected the target to.
- You can't Disrupt the same player twice.
- If you would Disrupt a player into visiting an Elite, they will instead visit themself.
- You gain another use of Disrupt when you kill a player.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Eliminate all opposition to the Elites.
